text: Desevio Ilan Payne (born November 30, 1995) is an American soccer player who plays as a defender for FC Emmen in the Eredivisie. ==Early and personal life== Payne was born in Greenwood, South Carolina, where his Trinidadian father met his Dutch mother at Lander University. His parents moved to the Netherlands when he was one year old, where he grew up. ==Career== ===Club career=== Payne made his professional debut on February 22, 2015, in the Eredivisie against Heerenveen. ===International career=== Payne is eligible to represent the United States and the Netherlands. Payne represented the United States at the 2015 FIFA U-20 World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Greenwood, South Carolina Category:American people of Dutch descent Category:American people of Trinidad and Tobago descent Category:African-American soccer players Category:American soccer players Category:Soccer players from South Carolina Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Groningen players Category:SBV Excelsior players Category:FC Emmen players Category:Eredivisie players Category:American emigrants to the Netherlands Category:Dutch footballers Category:Trinidad and Tobago footballers Category:United States men's under-20 international soccer players Category:American expatriate soccer players Category:American expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands
title: Desevio Payne
